text: Tuya Inc. is a Chinese company that works with AI and IoT solutions. The Tuya Smart platform deals with home automation. In 2020, Tuya co-hosted a conference about smart solutions on the South-East Asian market. Over 200 companies operating in the field of IoT were at the conference. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Technology companies of the People's Republic of China
title: Tuya Inc.
